If not, see 23 // <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>. 24 29 #ifndef _NEW_ALLOCATOR_H 30 #define _NEW_ALLOCATOR_H 1 31 32 #include <bits/new_allocator.h> 33 34 namespace __gnu_cxx _GLIBCXX_VISIBILITY(default) 35 { 36 _GLIBCXX_BEGIN_NAMESPACE_VERSION 37 48 template<typename _Tp> 49 class new_allocator : public std::__new_allocator<_Tp> 50 { 51 public: 52 #if __cplusplus <= 201703L 53 template<typename _Tp1> 54 struct rebind 55 { typedef new_allocator<_Tp1> other; }; 56 #endif 57 58 new_allocator() _GLIBCXX_USE_NOEXCEPT { } 59 60 new_allocator(const new_allocator&) _GLIBCXX_USE_NOEXCEPT { } 61 62 template<typename _Tp1> 63 new_allocator(const new_allocator<_Tp1>&) _GLIBCXX_USE_NOEXCEPT { } 64 }; 65 66 _GLIBCXX_END_NAMESPACE_VERSION 67 } // namespace 68 69 #endif
